feed.title: zurich4u
feed.subtitle: Favourite places in Zurich by Hotel Plattenhof and Townhouse

entry.title: Restaurant George - high above the Casino and Zurich's rooftops
entry.content: Welcome to the living room of the fictional host GEORGE. On their website George welcome you to his living room which can be described as: elegant, cultivated and distinguished. The restaurant is dominated by a lively bar in the center, live piano music and comfortable seating arrangements where you can enjoy good steaks, surf and turf as well as a variation of salads to start off your meal. The steaks are grilled to perfection, served with a sauce of your choice,  all the side dishes cost extra which makes the dining experience rather expensive. http://george-grill.ch/

entry.title: In the mood for pancakes or waffles
entry.content: Zum Guten Gluck, is a bright coffee shop with a modern Scandinavian touch that serves delicious pancakes all day long. Their pancake creations range from sweet to savory, my favourite being the one with ricotta. They also serve a very good breakfast 7 days a week.

entry.title: Zukunft - a club dedicated to music with local and international DJ's and bands
entry.content: Zukunft is a rather  small club in the trendy Kreis 4 : a good place for  electro, house and crossover party styles. The entrance is not easy to find, hidden in passage next to Bar 3000. It's not your see and to be seen club but  rather a place where good music and drinks are the main attraction. Hipsters and Rockers  party until the break of dawn. Open Thursday trough Saturday as of 11.00 pm. http://www.zukunft.cl/

entry.title: Einzigart unique trouvailles
entry.content: Einzigart is a shop that I rarely leave empty-handed even if I don’t plan to buy anything at all. You will find all kind of „stuff“ from little trinkets to small furniture, lots from local designers and all placed under the umbrella of DESIGN.  Josefstrasse 36, www.einzigart.ch
